dmca.title: Blogger DMCA Complaint from Gregory S. Aydt
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern:

I am writing in regards to an infringement of my copyright to a photograph I host on my site at 

the following address and on the following post:

http://rhymeswithright.mu.nu/archives/185371.php
http://rhymeswithright.mu.nu/images/MeandWarrior.jpg

Said image has been lifted from my site and used without my permission and after my specific 

demand that it be removed. The post in question is located at the following URL:

http://viewfrom22.blogspot.com/2006/10/role-of-blogs-in-local-politics_16.html

As you may notice from the comments, the owner of the site rejects my demand and insists that 

he will post the copyrighted image on his site, moving it from server to server to keep it up in 

defiance of my copyright.

Please take all appropriate action to remove unauthorized use of my copyright image and/or the 

entire post - up to and including the deletion of the offenders account if that is necessary to 

prevent his unauthorized use of my copyright image.

Please note that he has at least twice violated the terms of service of the image hosts by posting 

them on sites which include in their terms of service that the account owner is the copyright 

holder of the image.

I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials described above on the allegedly 

infringing web pages is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law.

I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the notification is accurate and that I 

am the copyright owner or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that 

is allegedly infringed.

Sincerely, 

Gregory S. Aydt 
rhymeswithright@gmail. com
